itemDescription: English professional football full back born 1943

wikipedia_page.main: Brian Leslie Kelly (22 May 1943 – 2 August 2018) was an English professional footballer who played as a full back in the Football League for Bradford City, Doncaster Rovers and York City. He later played for Halifax Town and Bartle Rovers.He was born in Ilkley in 1943. He died on 2 August 2018, aged 75.
